summary: I really hope the Mighty Nein investigate this ‘Cloven Crystal’ letter they found in Lorenzo’s bag of holding after the two week...

tags: but i also think its a choice
summary: The Game of Yes Jester has a unique life philosophy. There’s a game I like to play And it begins by saying yes I see the...
caption:
The Game of Yes

Jester has a unique life philosophy.

There’s a game I like to play
And it begins by saying yes

I see the providence of joy and I take it
Sink my teeth in and smile
With jam stained lips and cheeks dusted in sugar

I see the invocation of mischief and I revel in it
Run full force and delight
Turn the world upside down and belief inside out

I see the grace of friendship and I welcome it
Hold out my hand and hope
As fortunes are shared and a ring slides away

There’s a game I like to play
And it begins by saying yes

It’s simple to say no
And never try, never fail
But how can you bake a tart
If you never start a fire

It’s easy to say no
And never worry, never fear
But how can you share a joke
If you always hold your breath

It’s tempting to say no
And never falter, never be lost
But how can you follow the Traveler
If you refuse the journey

There’s a game I like to play
And it begins by saying yes

Yes to bright new horizons
Yes to the buffet of experiences before me
Yes to being and becoming and beyond all I ever knew

There’s a game I like to play
And it begins by saying yes

blog.description: Kelly | 24 | She/Her/They/Them | Ace | Multi-fandom blog | Icon by @apollinaresart | Blogging Critical Role, Good Omens, etc.

summary: Important question about my YouTube channel and Platform
title: Important question about my YouTube channel and Platform
body:
How would you all feel if I change my name to CritGemHero? I would keep my Tumblr name the same, but my YouTube and Twitch and other stuff I want to change it to this.

It is shorter, still has a good meaning, and just rolls off the tongue better. Would you guys be okay with that? It’s a big change but I think it’s for the best.

reblog.comment:

blog.description: Sally, she/her, 22, Critical role, D&D, comics, etc...

summary: The pieces of Molly they carry with them
body:
The pieces of Molly they carry with them

Caleb: periapt of wound closure, the heart around his neck

Fjord: Summer’s Dance scimitar, absorbed into his very being

Beau: the tarot cards, that she used to comfort Jester just like Molly would have

And there’s something really beautiful about that… I dont know

summary: The Life of Mollymauk Tealeaf. Death (Reversed) — Something that should have ended but did not.  Fool — New beginnings, a fresh...
caption:
The Life of Mollymauk Tealeaf.

Death (Reversed) — Something that should have ended but did not. 
Fool — New beginnings, a fresh start, optimism
Wheel of Fortune — Destiny, meeting people due to destiny leading them to you
Lovers — Being with the people we love, who love us, and who make us whole
Star — Joy, hope, a bright future
World — A cycle is complete

(See higher resolution on Twitter.)

summary:
Fjord: "Caduceus has a distinct 'old man smell'."
Caduceus: "I know exactly what he's talking about.  I sprout mung beans on a...
body:
Fjord: “Caduceus has a distinct ‘old man smell’.”

Caduceus: “I know exactly what he’s talking about. I sprout mung beans on a damp paper towel. They’re nutritious and filling, but they smell like death.”

reblog.comment:
